casebody.data:
AMEROP INDUSTRIAL CORPORATION, Appellant, v. The ELECTRIC AUTOLITE COMPANY, Appellee. No. 261. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 1, 1937. O’Connor & Farber, of New York City (Arnold T. Koch and Basil O’Connor, both *1004of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Larkin, Rathbone & Perry, of New York City (T. R. Iserman, Parker Newhall, and A. P. Whitehead, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
